h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)
content: Each Chapter of Black Myth: Wukong has a secret area to discover. Typically, these are filled with optional bosses, which you'll need to defeat to complete the area. You'll need to finish each of the chapter's secret areas and a side quest you can pick up in Chapter 3 to reach the game's secret - and true - ending. Here's everything you need to do to get there.
